DOC.brief_summary: To establish performance characteristic Samsung LABGEO IVD-A20 CHF Test intend use setting , compare test result A20 CHF Test result obtain FDA-cleared comparator assay .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Samsung LABGEO IVD-A20 CHF Test Point-of-Care Setting
DOC.criteria: CHF Subjects : 21 year age great , clinically confirm CHF present clinical site sign , symptom and/or risk factor suggestive heart failure . Subjects Potentially confounding comorbidities : NonCHF subject 21 year age great , potentially confound comorbidities diabetes , renal insufficiency , hypertension chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) Healthy Subjects : apparently healthy subject great 45 year age , prior history cardiacrelated disease . Apparently healthy subject history MI , CHF cardiacrelated disease ; Subjects acute decompensated heart failure currently nesiritide therapy ; Subjects participate another experimental drug , biologic , invasive device study within 30 day prior sign inform consent study , enrol concurrently investigative study ; Subjects unable refuse provide write informed consent .
